text: Ani tina manasancya avasthevarahi, jyanca mamala sthagita kela gela hota yethaparyanta ki jevha jamina apalya (visala) vistaranantarahi tyancyasathi sankucita (tanga) ho'u lagali ani te svatah apalya astitvasi hairana jhale ani tyanni samajuna ghetale ki allahapasuna kothehi asraya labhu sakata nahi, yakherija ki tyancyakade valale jave. Maga tyancya avasthevara daya keli. Yasathi ki tyanni bhavisyatahi ksama-yacana karavi. Nihsansaya sarvasrestha allaha tauba (ksama-yacana) kabula karanara ani atisaya daya karanara ahe
